BIO

I prefer to be called by my nickname Ace. I started learning to code when I received my first smartphone, a Symbian phone, back when I was in High school. I continued learning by taking up a Web Development course in college. I was able to deploy an enrollment and grading system in our department using HTML and CSS for front-end, and PHP and MySQL on the server side. I am currently expanding my knowledge by learning JavaScript(ES6) and familiarizing myself on the new terms of HTML5 and CSS3.
